channel.title: Ultimate Marvel vs Capcom 3
channel.description:
[img]http://comicartcommunity.com/gallery/details.php?image_id=45494[/img]
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ultimate_Marvel_vs._Capcom_3
Ultimate Marvel vs Capcom 3 is 'standalone' title from Marvel vs Capcom 3: Fate of two worlds. What was suppose to be an extension to Fate of Two Worlds turned into it's own game. This game is highly competitive, and you have to dedicate hours of practice to become efficient in fighting. The game consists of combos, team 'synergy', and type of play. This game should appeal to most people with it's superhero-ed background and conventional fighting tactics.
Overall, I'd give this game a solid 8/10
Has anyone else played it, or plays it?

item.title: Ultimate Marvel vs Capcom 3
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3

Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3 (Japanese: アルティメット マーヴル VS. カプコン3, Hepburn: Arutimetto Māvuru bāsasu Kapukon Surī) is a crossover fighting game developed by Capcom in collaboration with Eighting. It is an updated version of Marvel vs. Capcom 3: Fate of Two Worlds. The game features characters from both Capcom's video game franchises and comic book series published by Marvel Comics. The game was released in November 2011 for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, and was featured as a launch title for the P...

Ultimate Marvel vs Capcom 3 is ‘standalone’ title from Marvel vs Capcom 3: Fate of two worlds. What was suppose to be an extension to Fate of Two Worlds turned into it’s own game. This game is highly competitive, and you have to dedicate hours of practice to become efficient in fighting. The game consists of combos, team ‘synergy’, and type of play. This game should appeal to most people with it’s superhero-ed background and conventional fighting tactics.

Overall, I’d give this game a solid 8/10

Has anyone else played it, or plays it?
